textContent:
If you’re reading this, it probably means you're on the move, maybe with those friends (your boyfriends), who take too many risks, or drag you into plans you didn’t fully think through. And maybe it's late. Maybe you're somewhere you promised you wouldn’t go. Maybe you're just trying to enjoy the moment but your mind is a little unsettled. Mine definitely is. ğŸ˜

I’m not here to scold or control you. I trust your heart. ğŸ¤§
But I also care about your safety in ways that make me worry even when I don’t want to. You matter too much to me not to say this...
Please be careful. Please stay alert.
Don’t follow the crowd just to avoid saying no. Your peace, your life, your well-being...they come first, always.

I know you’re strong and smart and capable, but even the strongest need reminders sometimes, so here we're - 

ğŸ”ª Keep your phone charged.

ğŸ”ª Stay close to people you actually trust.

ğŸ”ª If something doesn’t feel right, don’t second 
      guess it... Leave! 

ğŸ”ª And if you're tired, rest. You're not missing out on   
      anything worth more than your safety.

ğŸ”ª Stay away from women other than your gf (Suvi).


I may be far away, but that doesn’t stop me from thinking of you every moment. You're carrying a piece of my heart with you wherever you go. So carry it gently, okay? ğŸ¥º

Come back safe. Come back whole. Come back to me. ğŸ¥ºğŸ˜­
Always waiting, always loving.ğŸ¥ºğŸ©·
Your suvi ğŸ¤§
title: Open when you're traveling alone.
textContentHtml:
If you’re reading this, it probably means you're on the move, maybe with those friends (your boyfriends), who take too many risks, or drag you into plans you didn’t fully think through. And maybe it's late. Maybe you're somewhere you promised you wouldn’t go. Maybe you're just trying to enjoy the moment but your mind is a little unsettled. Mine definitely is. ğŸ˜


I’m not here to scold or control you. I trust your heart. ğŸ¤§

But I also care about your safety in ways that make me worry even when I don’t want to. You matter too much to me not to say this...

Please be careful. Please stay alert.

Don’t follow the crowd just to avoid saying no. Your peace, your life, your well-being...they come first, always.


I know you’re strong and smart and capable, but even the strongest need reminders sometimes, so here we're - 


ğŸ”ª Keep your phone charged.


ğŸ”ª Stay close to people you actually trust.


ğŸ”ª If something doesn’t feel right, don’t second 

      guess it... Leave! 


ğŸ”ª And if you're tired, rest. You're not missing out on   

      anything worth more than your safety.


ğŸ”ª Stay away from women other than your gf (Suvi).



I may be far away, but that doesn’t stop me from thinking of you every moment. You're carrying a piece of my heart with you wherever you go. So carry it gently, okay? ğŸ¥º
